text:
### Guidlines for writing API documentation

Start with the URL of the api in code format (see this source by editing it in [/edit](/edit))
```
POST /api/example
```


Then write an example request with all variables that can be emitted

Request
```javascript
{
	token: "example"
}
```

All responses shall include a success and text attribute. The success will tell the client if the task was successfull, and the text should explain what action was performed.

Response
```javascript
{
	success: true,
	text: "Description of the action",
	example_extra_attr: [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
}
```
title: API
